text: ثم انشانا منۢ بعدهم قرونا ءاخرين

translations.translation: Then We raised up other generations after them.
Then after them We raised other generations.
Then, after them, We brought forth other generations.
After them We brought another generation into existence.
Then after them, We created other generations.
Then, after them, We created other generations.
Then We raised after them other generations.
Thereafter, after them, We produced other generations;
Then after them We brought forth other generations.
Then We raised up other generations after them,
Then after them We brought forth other generations.
Then after them We brought forth other generations.
Then We raised after them other generations.
Then, after them, We created other generations.
After them We produced other generations
Then, after them, We raised other generations.
Then We produced after them other generations.
[23:42] Then, after them, We brought forth other generations, [other] peoples.
(Then after them) then after their destruction (We brought forth other generations) from generation to generation.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { ثُمَّ أَنشَأْنَا مِن بَعْدِهِمْ } وانقراضهم { قُرُوناً آخَرِينَ } [المؤمنون: 42] يعني: قوم صالح ولوط وشعيب وغيرهم من الأمم الهالكة على الكفر والعناد بسبب تكذيب الرسل وكتبهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: قلت: القرن: أهل العصر، سُموا به لِقران بعضهم البعض، و تترا: حال، فمن قرأه بالألف فهو كسكرى، وهو من الوتر، واحداً بعد واحد، فالتاء الأولى بدل من الواو، وأصله: وَترى، كتراث وتقوى، والألف للتأنيث، باعتبار أن الرسل جماعة، ومن نَوَّنَه جعله كأرطى ومعزى، فيقال: أرطى ومعزى، وقيل: مصدر بمعنى فاعل، أي: متتابعين
